titleStmt.title: A proclamation adjourning the Parliament to the 5th of March 1700 years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text.
Signed at end: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of November, and of Our Reign the eleventh year 1699.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
